title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 650.3 - Access to interexchange or local exchange companies
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 650.3 - Access to interexchange or local exchange companies

State Regulations
(a) A payphone service provider shall not
take any action or enter into any agreement which restricts an end user's
access to any interexchange or local exchange carrier providing service to
payphone callers within the local access and transport area (LATA) in which the
payphone is located. (b) A payphone
service provider shall not take any action or enter into any agreement which
restricts an end user's access to any interexchange or local exchange carrier
providing interLATA long distance service to payphone callers. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
650.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
